name: Comunità di Venezia s.c.s.
goal:
Comunità di Venezia is a social-services cooperative that operates in the Venice area, Italy, helping people recover from addictions through both therapy facilities dedicated to assistance, rehabilitation and social reintegration of drug or alcohol addicts, and through research and training activities.
Comunità di Venezia collaborates with different partners to achive a wider planning regarding the contrast and the prevention of addictions. It is also a CME provider and organizes interventions for practitioner and operators of the social-health services.
euInitiatives: GBV: Dealing with women drug users victims of Gender Based Violence (GBV) - European approach to addressing drugs sustainably. This approach is enshrined in the EU Drugs Strategy 2013-2020.
